content.detailedDescription: I had just left a farm going west on township road 212 south east of calgary. when i came to road 797 and 212 this is when i saw two lights at 7 o'clock and 2 o'clock above the mountains. the sun was below the horizon. the sky was clear. i have never seen these lights in this part of the sky before.The lights were getting bright but not to bright. the first thing that came to mind was jet planes, but they did not move. i stopped to get a better look. i got out of the vehicle, looked up and they were gone. i was quite disappointed. got back in the vehicle, and started to drive again. suddenly to the right about 5 mountain tops over to the right the lights came on again but very bright. i pulled over got out of the vehicle. the lights started to get so bright it was as though they were getting closer. now the lights where in the same position as the first two. i turned on my phone camera and zoomed in, and as bright as the two lights where they would not show up on the screen even as a small bright light. they did not acted like satellites. and they most certainly were not planes. the lights went out as fast as they came on. it made me feel like yes we are still here watching over everything that is going on down there. this is not the only time that i have seen strange things in the skies.  i have been seeing quite a number of strange thing over and around calgary skies  in the last number of years. seems like it is happening a lot more these days.
content.summary: 4 lights, dim to supper bright and faded then gone.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend were doing exercise in bear creek park surrey b.C canada, early morning around 5:40 or 5:45 am. i saw a constant bright star like light it was very high in sky, we observe the incoming light path was from west to east south, it was having constant elevation and was moving with a tremendous speed. there was no exhaust trail. with in few seconds it was away from our eyes. it was on constant flight path. looking at the speed looks like there was no gravitational pull. we made sure it was not aircraft or rocket or meteoroid. there was no sound at all.
content.summary: White glowing ball light. observed moving in a staright line path

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the bermuda regiment at the time.  we were out during a weekend camp down by the grassy area just down the hill from warwick camp leading over to horseshoe beach.  it was just after midnight and my platoon (about 20 - 30 soldiers) were told to take a rest before the next exercise.  some sat on the grass others laid down on the ground.  as i laid on the ground looking up at the stars, i noticed what looked like one star suddenly moving.  it moved slowly in a s shaped flight path and continued to move.  

unbeknownst to me, the guy lying next to me was looking at the exact same thing.  we almost in unison said 'what the...."  we then began to laugh as we couldn't believe what we just observed.  we seemed to be the only persons there to have witnessed this object.  we didn't bother to speak to anyone else about it and hardly ever spoke to each other of the event afterwards.

i'm an avid airplane follower and no for certain it was not a high-flying aircraft.  there was just one solid light.  no port nor starboard light...No flashing lights.
content.summary: Observed light moving through stars with no specific flight path

content.detailedDescription:
i was working as a security guard for a local hospital. i was in the parking lot, facing in a westerly direction. i have an interest in star constellations. at approximately 2200 hrs.I looked up into the westerly sky. at a very high altitude, i observed an extremely bright sphere, that appeared to be stationary.  i looked away for several seconds and when i looked back, it was gone.
     approximately twenty mins. later, i observed another simular sphere in the same general area.  at first it appeared to be stationary. as i watched it, i observed it traveling at a slow pace in a northerly direction.  as i watched it, it changed into a thin line. after five or ten seconds it disappeared completely. there was not any trees or buildings nearby that could have hidden it.
     i live in an area where airplanes are flying over and am familiar with what they look like at night, even those that fly at high altitudes.  i do not believe what i saw was an airplane.
     it was at an extremely high altitude and did not have time to take a picture with my cellphone.
content.summary: Bright sphere of light, traveling slow speed. changed to thin line, then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking a bike ride at night and was looking up at the stars, suddenly i had saw a bright orange orb, that was tens of thousands of feet in altitude,and moving thousands of mph.. it appeared out of nowhere, and shot across the sky like a shooting star, yet without loosing speed had taken a 90Â° right angle turn, and stopped on a dime... it hovered silently at 10,000 feet or more, then the orange orb dimmed, and dissapeared.. i had over 30 hours logged flying helicopter's, yet i had have never seen or know of any aircraft which could replicate the movements i saw.... the craft appeared as suddenly as it had disappeared, with the entire event lasting no more than 10 seconds... i would estimate from my distance the object around 30 feet in diameter.. personally i had never seen anything like this in my life.... i had never mentioned what i saw too anyone, worrying what people would think, yet can't stop wondering what it was that i saw....  it appeared in the direction of fort dix, which is less than 30 miles away south west. also lakehurst naval base is less than 10 miles away west.....
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright darkish orange orb, too far away to make out shape...

content.detailedDescription: I was exiting a 7-11 right near my house when i noticed what looked like a massive explosion in the sky, however the light was steady. the object emitting the light was obviously solid but i couldn't determine the exact shape. it was traveling from my left to right in a straight line at about 3-5'000 ft then stopped and hovered for about 10-15 seconds. i put my bag down and grabbed my phone as the object started to fly straight up. i was able to get 3 pictures before the object appeared to exit our atmosphere and it's light faded out. the object never made a sound but i did see a ripple in the sky around it. it was basketball sized (way bigger than anything i've ever seen in the sky) when i first saw it and got smaller as it left, finally leaving my sight.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: I saw a bright orange light moving from left to right, then hovering, then exiting our atmosphere

content.detailedDescription: 2 objects.  on left side of flag in the sky, a dark roundish object flying in clouds to the left of the flag on the screen, very small can't make it out.  on the right side of the flag a strange transparent purple wormlike object in a vertical squiggle parallel to the flag pole.  news story about the anniversary of 9/11 showing s.F. police and firefighters paying respects in rememberance of the event 14 years ago.  kpix news at 5 pm today. my feelings were what the heck is the purple thing and my husband noticed the other object on the left, it was so small and looked rounded, no wings. flying in the sky. can't tell what direction based on the news story. it was in s.F. but not sure where exactly.  the time on the screen was 5:07 pm.  not sure when it was filmed today. maybe mid-day.
content.summary: Watching kpix 5pm news at 5:07pm story on 9/11 showing american flag on tv

content.detailedDescription: I noticed some horses just staring at a colt and that it was funny so i took a photo.  noticed a circular glint in the sky in the photo but could not see it myself, could only see it in the photos.  maybe nothing but the whole thing was strange.  it was not an airplane.
content.summary: It was totally invisible until i photographed it.  couldn't see it before or after i took the photo.

content.detailedDescription:
At approximatly 5:30 am on 9/11/15 i awoke from my bedroom couch to use the restroom and noticed a bright star type object in the se sky above downtown park city. the upper bedroom window faces faces se and has a view of the city lights. i layed back down on the couch and my viewpoint was an observation area of the city lights and the eve of my roof which is about 55'. i have observed this type of object on past occasions beginning in sept of 2009 on my deck in las vegas nv. this appeared to be the same type of anomaly and i observed it from 5;30 to 6:15 and eventually decided to take some video of it thru the window with my iphone but was too lazy to go outside as i have already taken photos of the lv event with a high powered 35 mm and i knew what i was seeing. i did not have any video so decided to shoot it for a short time. the object appears to be in the low atmosphere and pulsates as as a star flickers. as you watch it the object also moves in random ways and if i were to try and describe it almost like jumping. it jumps at light speed and appeared to stay about in the same general spot on the horizon. i used the iphone compass and observed the direction initially as 121' se and when it went above the eves it was at 126' se. i have seen this type object in pc before but it was always in the western sky and at night. i will include the video with this report as it is very cool to warch the jumps!

thanks
content.summary: Observed pulsating star like object in morning sky above park city

content.detailedDescription:
You kn9w you ask way too many questions tha t i cant answer know, this happened in 2002. ive jjst been watching your program in history channel, it was one summer night enjoying an evening with friends at our summer house. adults were playing cards inside the house and our kids were smoking or whatever they do in the terrace. all of a sudden one of the kids comes in screaming ab9ut a weird light... we all came out and saw a brilliant light over the lake sky, changing directions. a craft that was obvoiusly flying over our skyes, changig directions as no normal craft woud do. was spooky and incredible, and never reported it before as i didnt know who to do this.
your program in the history channel has inspired me t9 do this.
anyway my good friends, i believe weve been visited by these beings for a very long time, i dont think they are agressive but im afraid your own country usa, has made this a secret to gain the techology  that these beings can have, and use it as always to gain better control of this frail world.
sorry to say that but its what i feel
content.summary: Below is a description

content.detailedDescription:
Approx. 9 pm on 9-10-15, my husband was in his office and i was in living room on laptop.  doorbell rang, when i answered it there was a man and woman standing in my front yard. they were pointing to the sky, and stated that they wanted someone else to see what they were seeing. i ran to the office to get my husband and we went outside. there were 10-12 orange glowing lights passing over us. they were moving from se to nw.  no sound at all.  it was a cloudy night and they were below the clouds.  because of the darkness, we could see nothing but the orange lights. they were moving fairly slow, i ran inside to get my camera while my husband and the couple (strangers that live in our neighborhood that was taking a walk) stayed outside looking at the sky.  unfortunately  by the time i got back with my camera the lights seemed to be moving into the clouds and i could not get a shot with my camera. my husband took pictures with his phone but nothing showed up. we waited around out side for a few minutes to see if they came back, but they didn't.

all 4 of us felt 100% sure that the lights were not planes.  our first thought was some kind of ufo.

the couple stated that they had never seen anything like that before and neither had my husband or myself seen anything like that either.

my husband and i are in our early 60s and the couple were of a similar age.
content.summary: 10-12 orange glowing lights moving over us.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on the porch smoking a cigarette and talking on the phone to a friend in california. about 5 minutes into the conversation i caught movement above me. when i looked up i saw an object that reminded me of a decorative chinese fish. it was black bodied with an orange tail. at first i thought it was a kite. then i realized it was far too high, and there was no wind, not even the clouds were moving. i watched it for an hour thinking it might have been an unmanned hover craft. it slowly turned from side to side. i wanted to get a closer look with the camera on my phone. when i turned the camera on and aimed it to the sky the object was gone. it had simply disappeared the same way it appeared.  i spent 10 minutes looking for before i came to this web site and there is still no sign of it. it didn't come near the ground, make any sound that i could hear, there were no lights that i could see, and no trail of any kind. it's the strangest thing i've ever seen.
content.summary: Simply appeared then disappeared,  fish like black body, orange tail. near clouds, no wind.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my garden when i heard a loud humming sound looked around then upwards  i saw a diamond red object just above my tree  with pulsating red lights hovering above my tree [about 60 ft] above the ground  i ran indoors  then saw something come out of the object and walk round my garden i stayed indoors till they went  about 20 mins   the object then went up a little then hovered and slowly moved westward  then sped off  i went into the garden and found footprints going toward a bush  and there i found my cat mutilated  the object was still visible i went to get my camera but it had gone the footprint were like those of a lizard type animal  as i was standing there looking at my poor cat it came back  and i got a sort of picture just before it disappeared completely
content.summary: Sighting partial contact

content.detailedDescription: This event happened on tuesday 8th september 2015 at kaduna south in the city of kaduna, nigeria. the unidentified object appeared in the town and several people observed it as it was hovering and glowing and people where gathering shouting haleluyah and some where praying. they mistook the object to be virgin mary mother of christ. in a community like kaduna most people have never heard about ufo or extra- terrestial craft or beings and i guess the reason why they thought this phenomenon object is virgin mary. this video was posted on our church fellowship forum and when i viewed it i knew immediately this is not ordinary and i was convinced this is an unidentified object. i was told several people recorded the video with their mobile phone and i have decided to report this to mufon so they can review this video and carry out further investigation.
content.summary: Glowing flying object decended and landed flashing a beam of fireball

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i left on our vacation from illinois on july 23rd, 2015, we traveled to colorado.  on approximately july 24th we were traveling near boulder colorado and i decided to snap a couple pictures of the beautiful scenery. it was not until i got home and was looking through my pictures that i noticed the black/grey formation that appeared to be hanging down in the clouds in the 2nd picture. as i zoom in, it appears to have several black dots or formations around it.  i will attach both pictures and you can take a look. i took these pictures with my samsung galaxy 3 phone.  

i also am attaching a photo i snapped of the clouds over robinson, illinois on august 16, 2015. i was looking west around 5pm central time when i snapped it. if you zoom into the mouth of the cloud you can see what appears to be the torso of a man in the clouds and to his right is another man bowing to him.  the sky was absolutely beautiful, the sky was divided with rose/white coloring and as the clouds parted i could physically see the bright ball of light of the 1st man's head. i could not take my eyes off of it. i have more pictures of those clouds if you would like to see them just send me an email.
content.summary: Something black hanging down out of clouds with black things around the object

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend were seeing orbs of llight all night,my friend as stupid as he is pointed a very high powerd laser at this orb, ans instantlet it llight up like a cluster of 12 blue lights, the way it was arranged looked like some kind of single celled organism, i unplugged the laser and started yelling at him as we both noticed the craft coming down at us, it floated down like a pice of paper, and it gave off a low hum sound that pulsed through me, we instantly ran inside, but it didnt end there, about an hour later we came out side and it was right above my house. every step we would take it would squirm and wiggle to be right above us, it was deffinatley following us closley, it must have been from the laser, and then we went back inside freaked out. when we went back out side after another 30 min we noticed it again, and the last couple days i have noticed a black triagle that blended in with the stars, the riangle could have been in my head but the cluster organism thing has 3 other wittnesses. call me at 9793291662
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A cluster of lights in a membrame that moved like an insect, each light made a part of the organism, it followed our laser

content.detailedDescription:
I took this picture of an approaching storm at a skatepark where my son was skating.  i noticed the strange object in the picture after reviewing the photo at another location. 

i zoomed in on the strange object and because i couldn't identify it, i am contacting you.

this photo was taken with an iphone 6.
content.summary: I took this picture of an approaching storm and noticed the strange object in the sky after reviewing the photo later at a different location.

content.detailedDescription: I was with my daughter "amy" (7 years old) outside of my home looking the atlantic ocean to take a picture of the sunset. and then "amy" said to me: "dad, look that strange light over the sky". when i saw the sky, there were three long blue lights in parallel line like a beam light crossing the sky. so i took immediately my cellphone to record that curious phenomenon from the balcony of my home. the video recorder from my cellphone worked fine the first 30 seconds but suddenly something odd happened and then stopped recording. it was like a electromagnetic field that blocks the function of the video recorder. at that moment i've notice that something bright crossed from one blue light and jumped into the other blue light. minutes later those blue lights disappeared. i think that my video recorder was manipulated to block the displacement of this orb between those blue lights. i need to say that never weird happened to my cellphone until that day when i was recording those blue lights. see the only video attached to this report that is blocked for some emissions from magnetic field. the second video (no attached) show the same blue lights like the first video and was made after that light jumped between those blue lights.
content.summary: Weirds blue lights over the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Hello,
i stay on 4th floor in a building. it was around 11:00 pm when i got ready to sleep. but when i was about to go to bed and turned off the lights, i noticed a white orb hovering in the neighbourhood at 25 ft high. the object when appeared started increasing it's glowing thing. 
i once thought someone fired a bullet from flare gun, that's why it stayed for almost 5 mins. but the orb started increasing its glowness. 
so i got scared and closed my eyes. couple of minutes later when i opened my eyes to see whether the orb is still hovering over there, it disappeared. 
that's it. that's my story.
content.summary: The orb like structure hovered at one place. it was glowing and casting white light.

content.detailedDescription:
I took this picture at lovina beach (north bali).
i was taking many pictures of a beautiful sunset (many other people do the same here, the spot is reknown for that).
few days after i saw an object on the picture and it is a ufo.
when i took the picture, i saw nothing, neither the people around. i took another picture on the same minute just before and nothings appears, and the next one 2 minutes after and nothing appears either.
so it might have moved very fast.
the form of it is very precise as a "half a sphere".
content.summary: Ufo appearing on a classical sunset photo few days after being done

content.detailedDescription: I was in the park with my friends playing hide and seek we were observing some constellations i thought it was plane but another pane was flying at the same position and the object was at very high attitude and was  moving very fast ,it was not even blinking and it was made of white lightened thing it was moving straight but very fast we were just shocked and told our parents we lose sight of object because it was moving very fast.
content.summary: It was above the plane and it was moving very fast at very high speed and it was not blinking it was at very high alttitude

content.detailedDescription: I looked out my bedroom window at 4 am. a light appeared so bright.Lasted 2/half hours. silent n huge diamond shaped disc. only moved upwards but on a slant. it was rotating and spinning very fast. i've seen it 3 times in this month of september. every time its the same time 4am. and around the same area. and does the same thing when the sun comes up it starts to descend .Like it doesnt want to be noticed in the daylight.
content.summary: Whole ship was glowing white/orange.Hovering then slowly tookoff towards the heavens as daylight appeared. this was the third time in a month i seen it.

content.detailedDescription:
08/11/2015

i was at a friends house chilling, having a beer and catching up as we'd not seen each other for a few weeks, after a while i went outside to smoke a cigarette. i lit my cigarette and sat down in a chair in his back yard.

as i looked up at the sky in front of me i saw the flashing lights of a passenger plane that looked like it was on the landing approach to liverpool john lennon airport, flying in from left to right (east to west), this is more than 20 miles away from my location in westhoughton. as i watched the plane on its approach i noticed a flash of light above my head over 500 ft above and slightly to the left of me, this light immediately went from its position heading south at speed that i have never witnessed in my life. the flight path was direct from north to south and flew pretty close to the rear of the plane in view, as the light left my view i noticed another flash of light above and to the left of me only a little to the right from where the first light appeared, that object then took the same path as the first and seemed to fly over the landing plane and at the same speed as the last light.

all this happened in less than 2 seconds and in complete silence. i was so excited i lept from my seat and started to shout my friend who was inside his house talking to another friend, i could see him trough his window and he was less than 8 ft from my location. i shouted him about 3 times as loud as i dared without upsetting the neighbours, but he never heard my calls. i only lost sight of the objects because of the speed they were doing they hit the horizon in a split second.

this is not my first sighting of these types of craft but was the most exiting that's the reason for me to share this with you guys. i have seen them in the daytime where i live in westhoughton, they were both spherical silver objects probably the size  of a minivan, i have also seen them on 2 occasions whilst on holiday in egypt and have seen them at night time leaving the atmosphere. but last night was by far the most exciting experience i have ever had, and look forward to many more.

thanx for reading.
content.summary: I saw two lights that appeared then flew as far as i could see in less than 2 seconds

content.detailedDescription: I seen a blue beam shoot down from the sky and as it came down the slower it was. i lost sight of it because of the neighbors mobile home in front of me. as i went to unlock the my front door my son had told me that their was a light and i noticed that the mobile home across from me their was a ball of light  just hovering a foot from the roof. then a second ball of light came from the back of the neighbors roof from across of us. so their were now two balls of light then two more came and lit up. now their were four balls of light flashing at us. but they were in a perfect formation lined up with each other. i went and grabbed my cell phone and started to record this event.  i was able to record it and also was able to see more in the video then i was able to see in real life. i then got scared stopped recording and went inside my home.
content.summary: I seen a blue beam shot down from the sky and then a few seconds after their were a four balls of light that were 30 feet from my kids and myself silently hovering. each light was pulsating different from each other. i recorded some of the incident.

content.detailedDescription: Triangle craft was caught moving at approximately 2000-3000 feet altitude from north to south direction at extreme speed.  no lights visible - only slightly highlighted from the sun in the horizon from the west.  the sun glint/highlighted areas on the craft were in the corners of the triangle and seemed rounded.  it was just barely visible against the dark sky but the object was darker than the sky.  object made no sound there was a commercial airplane at higher altitude in same area and the plane could be heard and the triangle object seemed completely silent.
content.summary: Black triangle moving at extreme speed

content.detailedDescription:
It was around 3am in the morning of the winter of 2012 south philadelphia. after leaving my friends house was walking across the street towards my house.I saw an object slightly bigger than the moon on the corner of my eyes. at first i thought it was just the moon since it was red i stopped to looked it again to get better view. i quickly realized that it wasn't the moon as the object start moving slowly at first to the left. it felt overwhelming as the object was very bright shining down the street brighter then the moon casting shadows. as it was moving the air around it looked like it was on fire it was glowing red. its really hard to describe it the object was giving off lot off heat you could see the air around it in detail like  it was on fire but everything was red. as it was slowly moving horizontal it quickly  descended down as i lost visual when it went behind the building which is a school at least 6 stories high. when the object descended down very quickly i started running towards my house and ran up the stairs while covering my head. i don't know why but my first thought since the object shoot downwards once it hit the ground it was gonna create huge explosion.
when i first saw the object moving i looked around to see if there was other people around there was another person down across the street from me not that far as i looked at him he was looking up and around when he saw me and he realized i was aware of the object too as we made eye contact he pointed up towards the object looking just as overwhelming and confused as i was. i regret that i didn't do more took a picture or at least went over to talk to the guy instead running into the house. when you see something your not gonna act as you think you will. i had hard time embracing it even the next morning i had to reminded my self like in back of my mind i didn't want to believed that i saw it but i know i saw it. i looked online that day to see if it was on the news or if anybody else took a picture or posted something about it but i got nothing. i did found a picture of an object that pretty much looked like the one i saw. if i could get a chance to talk to anybody else who also saw the same thing that night would make that experience even more extraordinary as i wouldn't doubt at all if something like that exists that i would be so closed minded and live in the little bubble like a stubborn child thinking we the only ones out there.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Very bright red glowing sphere bigger then the moon the air around it look like on fire was hovering then moved slowly then descent rapidly

content.detailedDescription: Had my dogs outside. thought i was looking at a plane at first but noticed there was no soundd, came up to about 100 yards of me, turned and i saw it was a massive craft. completely silent. breathtaking.
content.summary: Triangular formation. lights on corners. one large light in center. completely quiet.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking home from a friends and i seen her.
content.summary: It was right infornt of me omg dude like i seen her is was beautiful but it only lasted 5 mind or so she looked me right in the eyes like she was looking into my soul with a smile the intire time...

content.detailedDescription:
Flat black typical sauser shape stealth surfaced radar fract. shorting electrical malfuntion droppings to ground very loud. very close. slow moving.
working on my car looked up to see what was making all the noise. i could not move as was not believing what i was seeing. i never believed in that kind of stuff but after that siding i'm a believer in ships having antigravity.
content.summary: Flat black 60ft stealth surfaced ufo having electrical shorting problem arcing loud sparks.

content.detailedDescription: After getting ready to leave the grasslands from a day of shooting at the range i decided to take a landscape photo of the beautiful environment. as i held the camera up to take the picture the sun was in my eyes and i couldn't get a clear view of the screen and took the picture. i than got in my car and headed home once i made it back i took a look at the photo and was as shocked as could be when i saw this craft looking object on the side of the screen
content.summary: Outdoors taking a landscape photo, craft appeared in photo when reviewing the image
